title: Axis Bank rises to top in credit card terminals, surpassing ICICI Bank
description: Axis Bank took the lead in credit card terminals within four years. By June 2024, it had 18.7 lakh terminals and a 20.8% market share. It targeted businesses with high UPI transactions and introduced low-cost card acceptance devices and the Neo merchant app to simplify payment processes, surpassing ICICI Bank's terminal count.
